{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07504v1", "title": "On Ihara's lemma for definite unitary groups", "summary": "Clozel, Harris, and Taylor proposed a conjectural generalized Ihara's lemma
for definite unitary groups. In this paper, we prove their conjecture over
banal coefficients under some conditions. As an application, we prove a
level-raising result for automorphic forms associated to definite unitary
groups.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT,math.RT", "published": "2025-04-10T07:03:27Z"}
